text: @GOPLeader @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis Did I miss Donnie or the White House making a statement that they are going to protect our troops? This gaslighting garbage from Kevin is a simple distraction from money being paid for our dead troops, Kev doesn't  care about COVID-19 he cares about protecting Donnie
